Surfing is a surface water sport in which the wave rider, referred to as a surfer, rides on the forward or deep face of a moving wave, which is usually carrying the surfer towards the shore.
Surfing is a surface water sport in which the participant is carried along the face of a breaking wave, most commonly using a surfboard.
The sport of riding a surfboard toward the shore on the crest of a wave
Sport that consists of riding a wave

description: The Man Surfing, Type-4 emoji is a sequence of the  Surfer,  Emoji Modifier Fitzpatrick Type-4, ? Male Sign and ? Variation Selector-16
apple_vendor_description: The man surfing emoji on Apple devices showcases a dynamic figure with a medium skin tone, captured mid-wave with energetic motion. Apple's signature smooth gradients and realistic lighting bring the cresting water and the surfer's determined gaze to life, highlighting the thrill of the sport. Its glossy, rounded form conveys exhilaration and a sense of adventure, perfect for expressing outdoor activities or a feeling of riding a wave of success.
